content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) and a furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position (39.5, -79.5)) that puts into furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
-  Belt group that connects the furnace at position (41.0, -80.0) to burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)

### Copper plate mine at position(60, -60)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (60.0, -60.0))

### Electricity generator at position(111, -30)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position (106.5, -32.5))
-  Boiler (position (111.5, -32.0))
-  Steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5))
-  Pipe group (fluid system 212405) that connects offshore pump to boiler
-  Pipe group (fluid system 212400) that connects boiler to steam engine
-  Electricity group (id 613078) that connects steam engine to small electric poles

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities function
-  Ensure that the positions passed to the connect_entities function are integers, not floats.

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure that the entity is placed at a valid position on the map.

### Errors when using burner entities
-  Ensure that the burner entities have sufficient fuel to operate.

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables:
  -  `pump`: entity
  -  `boiler`: entity
  -  `steam_engine`: entity
  -  `Prototype.Pipe`: entity prototype
  -  `Prototype.SmallElectricPole`: entity prototype
